mapper.sql: ID, VALUE, LABEL, TYPE, DESCRIPTION, SORT, PARENT_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG
mapper.select:
select
from sys_dict where del_flag = '0' ORDER BY TYPE,SORT

select
from sys_dict where del_flag = '0' and TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict (ID, VALUE, LABEL, TYPE, DESCRIPTION, SORT, PARENT_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

update sys_dict
VALUE = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LABEL = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_dict set VALUE = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LABEL = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SORT = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select property_key PROPERTY_KEY,property_val PROPERTY_VAL from sys_property where del_flag = '0' and active_flag='1'
